item.title: linxor
item.description: Last night a friend of mine gave me a couple tickets to the interpol show at the metro. it was a good time. I hadn’t really heard them and they did put on a good show. it was nice to see and I was able to see soem friends and all that.. wee.. I should get my ipod today. I am excited. I am redoing my MP3 attitude.. I am gunna be setting up a centralized MP3 system for our apartment.
